```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
using UFFio
```

`UFFio.jl` provides several helper functions to facilitate interaction with UFF datasets. At the moment, the following helper functions are available:

- `connectivity_matrix`: Returns the connectivity matrix extracted from `Dataset2412`.
- `dataset_types`: Returns the list of all dataset types extracted from an UFF file.
- `supported_datasets`: Lists all dataset types that are currently supported for reading.

## Example usage

### Connectivity Matrix
```julia
using UFFioReader

# readuff returns a vector of datasets
data2412 = readuff("path/to/your/file2412.uff")[1]
connectivity = connectivity_matrix(data2412)
```

### Dataset Types
```julia
using UFFioReader

# Only one dataset is read
data = readuff("path/to/your/file.uff")[1]
dtype = dataset_types(data)

# Several datasets are read
data_all = readuff("path/to/your/file.uff")
dtypes = dataset_types.(data_all)
```

### Supported Datasets
```julia
using UFFioReader

valid_datasets = supported_datasets()
```
